title: Exclusive: Apple Studio Display with higher resolution than Pro Display XDR in development
content:
Apple has given no sign that it is working on a new version of the Pro Display XDR, which was introduced in 2019. However, rumors suggest that there are new external displays from Apple under development. 9to5Mac has now heard from sources familiar with the matter that the company has been working on a new “Apple Studio Display” with higher resolution than the Pro Display XDR.

more…

The post Exclusive: Apple Studio Display with higher resolution than Pro Display XDR in development appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: 9to5Mac has heard from sources that Apple has been working on a new "Apple Studio Display" with higher resolution than the Pro Display XDR.
